name: Bottle Exchange & Deposit Management (VDP)
description: Comprehensive returnable bottle and container deposit management solution designed for dairy and beverage distribution operations. Automates deposit tracking, return processing, and liability management for returnable containers through the complete lifecycle from initial sale through customer returns and reconciliation. Includes route manifest integration for delivery driver bottle exchanges, multi-location bottle inventory tracking, and automated deposit credit application workflows. IMPORTANT: This is a planning/design template project - implementation files are not yet developed.

constraints.value: Inventory, Multi-Location Inventory, Custom Records, Server-Side Scripting
